scripts.lint: yarn --cwd api/ lint && yarn --cwd common/ lint && yarn --cwd platforms/ lint && yarn --cwd ui/ lint
scripts.install:all: yarn install && yarn --cwd api/ install && yarn --cwd common/ install  && yarn --cwd platforms/ install && yarn --cwd ui/ install && mvn -q -f edge/pom.xml clean install
scripts.build:all: (cd router && exec ./build.sh) && (cd edge && exec ./build.sh) && (cd api && exec ./build.sh)
scripts.dockerize:all: (cd router && exec ./dockerize.sh) && (cd edge && exec ./dockerize.sh) && (cd api && exec ./dockerize.sh)
scripts.test:all: yarn --cwd api/ test && yarn --cwd ui/ test && mvn -f edge/pom.xml test
scripts.clean:all: docker rm router edge api mongodb
scripts.stop:mongodb: docker stop mongodb-dev && docker rm mongodb-dev
